messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I am one of the Ninja Trio!
Being discovered means I must battle!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
While I hid in the tall grass, I
sensed Pokémon all around me!Furtive sounds of movement...
Stifled cries... I heard them!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
You don’t remember me?
I am one of the Ninja Trio! Being discovered means I must battle!
